item.title: A New Blog
item.description: For nearly a decade, while I dedicated myself to building out Grafana Labs and subsequently took some personal time to recuperate from said dedication, this blog has withered through neglect. I came out of these experiences as a different person, and am ready to share a few things I learned. Meanwhile, I have also started some new projects I’ld like to share. Updated hugo to the latest version, found a new theme, let’s go.
